### Iron Plate Smelter at position (4.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0)

### Iron Chest Storage at position (4.5, -58.5)
Consists of:
- Iron chest at position (4.5, -58.5)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- Ensure you have all the required ingredients before attempting to craft an item. In this case, the agent repeatedly tried to craft iron chests without having enough iron plates.
